# @uppy/xhr-upload

## 2.1.2

Released: 2022-06-07
Included in: Uppy v2.12.0

- @uppy/xhr-upload: replace `ev.target.status` with `xhr.status` (Wes Sankey / #3782)

Released: 2022-05-30
Included in: Uppy v2.11.0

## 2.1.0

Released: 2022-05-14
Included in: Uppy v2.10.0

## 2.0.7

Released: 2021-12-09
Included in: Uppy v2.3.1
